name: <% replace with project name kebab-case %>
author: Wallace SidhrÃ©e <i@dreamyguy.com> (https://github.com/dreamyguy)

repository.url: <% replace with project repo full url ssh %>

copyright: Copyright (c) Wallace SidhrÃ©e & <% replace with owners name %> - All rights reserved.

scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:backend && npm run deploy:frontend
scripts.postDeploy: echo ðŸš€  The application is now fully deployed.
scripts.postSetup: echo ðŸŽ‰  The application is now fully installed.
scripts.preDeploy: echo âš¡  About to deploy both frontend and backend.
scripts.preSetup: echo âš¡  About to install all dependencies needed in both frontend and backend.
scripts.release: HUSKY_SKIP_HOOKS=1 npx bump --commit 'ðŸš€ Release v' --tag --push package.json package-lock.json backend/package.json frontend/package.json
scripts.setup-0-install-all-dependencies: npm i @sanity/cli -g && npm i && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ..
scripts.setup-2-set-remote: git remote add origin <% replace with project repo full url ssh %>
scripts.setup-3-add-files: chmod +x lib/preCommit.sh && git add .babelrc .editorconfig .envExample .eslintignore .eslintrc.js .gitignore .huskyrc .nvmrc .prettierrc .travis.yml LICENSE README.md backend/ config.js config.test.js frontend/ jest.config.js lib/ netlify.toml package-lock.json package.json tests/
scripts.setup-4-first-commit: git commit -m 'âœ¨ First commit, by create-some-app' --no-verify && git push --set-upstream origin production
scripts.setup-5-create-develop-branch: git branch develop && git checkout develop && git push --set-upstream origin develop
scripts.setup-6-first-tag: git checkout production && git tag -m 'ðŸš€ First release, by create-some-app' v0.0.1 && git push --tags
scripts.setup: HUSKY_SKIP_HOOKS=1 npm run setup-0-install-all-dependencies && npm run setup-1-create-production-branch && npm run setup-2-set-remote && npm run setup-3-add-files && npm run setup-4-first-commit && npm run setup-5-create-develop-branch && npm run setup-6-first-tag
